name: DU-C/K
description:
The game was made for Game Off game-jam 2018. The idea is to rapidly change between minigames, each of them based on one facet of a duck.

TODO

The game is far from complete. Some things were thought of as optional from the start, but a lot of stuff was put aside as the deadline came nearer and nearer.

Work to do (in general order):

  • (better) graphical art
  • sounds and effects
  • gameplay features
  • character animation

Images used in the start screen: shark, eagle and cheetah.

Thanks for playing! If you liked the game, tell your friends about it.
